    • About Matt & Jenna Freda


    Matt and Jenn Freda have a decade of experience in the real estate business, and are the leaders of a top-producing team in the Greater Orlando Area. In the past 3 years teamFREDA has sold over 500 homes! Their websites attract hundreds of thousands of views annually, and they have a database of over 9,000 buyers actively searching in the Greater Orlando Area.

    A normal real estate transaction has over 200 separate tasks that require a variety of skills. For the same price as working with a normal agent, working with Matt and Jenn ensures that you have a full team behind you, including buyer specialists, a marketing department, administrative assistants, and transaction coordinators, among others. With their team structure, technology, and systems in place, Matt and Jenn Freda have the experience and knowledge necessary to get your property sold for the most money in the least amount of time.

    Matt & Jenna Freda
